name: Vivin Paliath
body:
### Projects

 - [**Regula**](http://vivin.github.io/regula/): "A better way to validate forms". Regula is an annotation and constraints-based client-side form-validation library written in JavaScript.
 - [**Aká¹£i**](http://aksi-neural-network.appspot.com/): This is a neural network that recognizes digits. The code for the neural network is available [here](https://github.com/vivin/DigitRecognizingNeuralNetwork) and the code for the Spring webapp that showcases it is available [here](https://github.com/vivin/aksi).
 - [**Generic Tree**](https://github.com/vivin/GenericTree): A Java library that lets you build n-ary trees. 
 - [**syma**](https://github.com/vivin/syma): An Arduino driver and Python GUI for controlling the Syma S107 RC Helicopter.
 - [**torqueo**](https://github.com/vivin/torqueo): A framework that helps you easily build performance tests using the [The Grinder](http://grinder.sourceforge.net/) performance-testing framework. Documentation is available [here](http://vivin.net/2009/09/16/writing-performance-tests-in-grinder-using-a-framework/). **Warning:** This project is out of date; it won't work if the output format of the recorder has changed.
 - [**sulekha**](https://github.com/vivin/sulekha): A text-based markov-chain generator.
 - [**CherryBlossom**](https://github.com/vivin/CherryBlossom): A Brainf*ck analog that lets you write code using Haikus.
 - [**bAdkOde**](https://github.com/vivin/bAdkOde): An esoteric programming language.

### Contact

You can [reach me](http://vivin.net/contact) on my [website](http://vivin.net).
